name: where-in-the-world
description: This is a solution to the [REST Countries API with color theme switcher challenge on Frontend Mentor](https://www.frontendmentor.io/challenges/rest-countries-api-with-color-theme-switcher-5cacc469fec04111f7b848ca). Additionally, this project aims to assess my ability to apply the skills and knowledge acquired throughout the MERN Stack course in a practical, real-world scenario.
